title: Come and work for BikeRadar! We’re recruiting for five new roles
content:
Want to work for BikeRadar? We’re recruiting for five new roles – yep, you read that right – across a wide range of positions in the BikeRadar editorial team.

The BikeRadar team is growing quickly and this is your chance to come along for the ride. We’re on the hunt for passionate riders to join us in the following new positions:

  • Technical Editor (Road)
  • Digital Writer
  • Content Manager, Video
  • SEO Analyst
  • Senior Production Editor

Whether you’re an experienced editor ready to take our road tech coverage to the next level, a talented writer capable of offering sound buying and riding advice to our audience of millions of riders, or a data-savvy digital expert ready to work at the cutting edge of cycling media, we’ve got a job for you.

Job adverts for all positions are available to view on the Immediate Media website. Applications close from Friday 16 July.
author: BikeRadar
